attributes.action: Expel all foreign national undesirables immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With regard to the European Commission giving a green light to Italy's expulsion of 'undesirable EU citizens' we expect Gordon Brown and Liam Byrne to expel ALL foreign 'undesirables' regardless of their nationality immediately. No criminal record is necessary, no trial and no appeal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
